Package bbc.rd.tvanytime.util

Provides classes containing useful tools for convering between data types used with the TV Anytime API and tables.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DVBLocatorToolbox DVBLocatorToolbox: A class (which should be treated as abstract) offering useful methods on DVB Locators.
GenreToolbox GenreToolBox: Contains tools for use with Genres.
ScheduleManager Manages TV-Anytime metadata and acts as a central point for accessing it.
TimeToolbox TimeToolbox: A class (which should be treated as abstract) offering useful methods on TV Anytime time and date types.
TVAnytimeGenreToolbox TVAnytimeGenreToolBox: Implementation of GenreToolbox specifically for TV-Anytime Genres.
TVAnytimeHowRelatedToolbox TVAnytimeHowRelatedToolBox: Implementation of GenreToolbox specifically for TV-Anytime HowRelatedCS.
 

Package bbc.rd.tvanytime.util Description

Provides classes containing useful tools for convering between data types used with the TV Anytime API and tables.
